Dialogue.Page: Welcome to my assortment of planets, I hope you enjoy discovering their secrets!
You can use the black holes around us to warp to any planet you want.
Theres a signal on the in front of each of them indicating which planet is linked to that Black Hole.
Each black hole is marked by a projection in front of it that tells you where it will take you to.
What planet do you want to explore first?
It's always a good idea to start from the bottom.
Jotunn is a very cold planet making hard to live on and quite dark.
Gin, a good friend of mine, lives there. He enjoys it, but I can't understand why...
Enter into the black hole to my left when you feel ready and it'll warp you there.
Good luck!
Midas is a beautiful planet filled with molten gold.
(It's actually gold-tinted water, but I shouldn't be telling you that...)
Now... good luck! You will need it, as this one is a bit scarier than Gaia.
Surtr is not a great planet to visit, as it's pretty deadly.
It's suffocating over there, which is the opposite of "Jotunn". Be careful around the lava, too!
I'm linked to a mnemonic statue, just like you! Seeing you wake up here again and again is making me starting to like you. UwU
Ready? Then use the black hole next to the campfire and you'll get to Surtr in no time.
Have you already explored "Jotunn"?
I don't actually care... Gaia is a nice place. It's really pretty and full of nature and beauty.
Go ahead! Please enjoy your visit.
Feel free to use the black hole next to Jotunn's.
OHHHHH Really? Do you really want to go to "The Lair"?

DialogueOption.Text: Don't underestimate me, I can handle it!

Dialogue.Page: First of all, don't talk to me like that.
But... Hi! I'm the mod's creator's spiritual representation in Outer Wilds.
His name is Fixxion, and you can contact him many different ways.
You can always contact him through the Official Outer Wilds Modding Discord Server to make suggestions. I'm sure he will listen.
He spends most of his time on Youtube as "Fixxion's Lair", where he makes Spanish videogame content. Especially Outer Wilds content.
Be sure to check him out if you are interested!
Wise choice. Talk to me again before you visit the other planets.
HAHAHAHA! I like your spirit! Just make sure you don't... well... you will find out yourself.
See ya! Or not... Just try not to make a lot of noise.
